channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘The Legend Of Zelda’ Movie Casts Zelda And Link, Nintendo’s Shigeru Miyamoto Reveals
item.description: The stars of The Legend Of Zelda live-action movie have been revealed by Nintendo's Shigeru Miyamoto.

item.title: What Happens After The Championship? The Silent Struggle In Pro Sports

item.title: Allowing The Nvidia H20 Into China Is A Good Start — But Not Enough

item.title: Meet The Rubik’s Cube That’s Part Console, Part Puzzle, And All Chaos
item.description: Behold, the Rubik's WOWCube: the console-puzzle hybrid you never asked for, but obviously want to try, because it's weird but somehow exciting?

item.title: Artificial Intimacy: Grok’s New Bots. A Scary Future Of Emotional Attachment
